function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prevention of virus propagation indicators missing","Impact":"Potential for increased risk of contagious disease spread within built environment","Mitigation":"Include touchless technologies, self-cleaning spaces, and efficient air filtration systems","Technologies":"Touchless technologies, self-cleaning materials, air filtration systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Mental health indicators missing","Impact":"Potential negative impact on residents' mental health","Mitigation":"Establish safe and sound connections to outdoor spaces, such as balconies","Technologies":"Outdoor space design, balcony access","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, property managers"},{"Description":"Air quality indicators missing","Impact":"Potential for poor air quality and increased pathogen propagation","Mitigation":"Establish efficient air filtration systems","Technologies":"Air filtration systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
